alert.note: Alert for East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:42PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Niobrara, northwestern Goshen and northeastern Platte Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 641 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm due south of the area between Lost Springs and Lusk, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lusk, Manville, Keeline and Rawhide Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County
